title: Pelon's Baja Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. California-style Mexican food restaurant with a few outlets. Makes burritos, tacos, nachos, and such. Many items can be ordered vegan with plant proteins in the style of beef/fish/chicken as well as vegan sour cream, vegan cheese, and sauces. Has an egg-style tofu scramble for the breakfast items. Casual, surf-inspired atmosphere.
